channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - December 27, 2019
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-december-27-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
This is the last roundup post of 2019, and I wanted to say thanks to everyone who contributed to making this a great year of gaming. If you haven't joined in the fun yet, I hope you give it a try in the new year! To get started, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
